definition: to replace firmware (on a mobile device)
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: We recommend you charge the battery up to 100% before starting the upgrade.
sentences.chinese: 建議你在刷機之前將電池充滿電。

sentences.english: Various brands, software, mobile phone flash theme, technical exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 各種品牌手機刷機，軟件，主題，技術交流。

sentences.english: The Program will check your device information and it will automatically jump to next step.
sentences.chinese: 刷機程序將檢查你的設備信息，並自動跳到下一步。

sentences.english: It is mandatory to have the content files installed on PC, otherwise Refurbishment process will be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 必須先在電腦中安裝固件包，否則無法刷機。

sentences.english: You can check the upgrade process on your mobile device screen.
sentences.chinese: 你可以再設備屏幕上看到刷機過程。

definition: flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc)/to rebuild/to renovate
to cheat in an online game (abbr. for 開外掛|开外挂[kai1 wai4 gua4])/(coll.) unbelievably good
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
(coll.) to beat it/to take French leave
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
